verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father of kindness
You have poured out grace
You have brought me out of darkness
You have filled me with peace

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Giver of mercy
You're my help in time of need
Lord, I can't help but sing

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Faithful, You are
Faithful, forever You will be
Faithful, You are

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Beautiful Savior
You have brought me here
You pulled me from the ashes
You have broken every curse

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Blessed Redeemer
You have set this captive free
Lord, I can't help but sing

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Faithful, You are
Faithful, forever You will be
Faithful, You are

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Faithful, You are
Faithful, forever You will be
Faithful, You are

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
I will rest in Your promises
My confidence is Your faithfulness
I will rest in Your promises
My confidence is Your faithfulness

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
I will rest in Your promises
My confidence is Your faithfulness
I will rest in Your promises
My confidence is Your faithfulness

verse.name: v13
verse.lines:
Faithful, You are
Faithful, forever You will be
Faithful, You are

verse.name: v14
verse.lines:
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"

verse.name: v15
verse.lines:
Faithful, You are
Faithful, forever You will be
Faithful, You are

verse.name: v16
verse.lines:
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"
All Your promises are "Yes and Amen"

verse.name: v17
verse.lines:
Thank You Lord
What a faithful God You are
We say "thank You"
We say "thank You"

verse.name: v18
verse.lines:
Oh, I'm not losing hope
'Cause I know that my God is faithful
Do you know that Your God is faithful?
Oh, I'm not losing hope

verse.name: v19
verse.lines:
I'm not giving up
'Cause my Father is faithful
Oh, my Father is faithful
We say "Yes and Amen"

verse.name: v20
verse.lines:
Oh, my Father is faithful
Yes and Amen
Oh, my Father is faithful
Yes and Amen

verse.name: v21
verse.lines:
We proclaim, my Father is faithful
Yes and Amen
Oh, my Father is faithful
Yes and Amen
